name: Jigsaw Wood Block
description:
Block Jigsaw puzzle is an innovative wooden block puzzle designed and constantly updated for puzzle lovers!
Drag the cube pieces at the bottom of the interface to find a suitable place in the given pattern to place the cube pieces until the pattern is filled correctly.
Each jigsaw puzzle is a unique design, allowing you to get a unique wooden block puzzle experience. With multiple jigsaw levels and exquisite patterns, welcome to the amazing Jigsaw blocks world!
Enjoy different block puzzles anywhere, anytime with No Wifi needed. Just drag, drop and move. Once you start, you will be hooked and won't stop playing the best block puzzle games. Enjoy endless mind-blowing trailers!
